locations.title: Kololo Independence Grounds
locations.description: Historic grounds where Uganda's independence was celebrated. Now hosts major events and recreational activities in the heart of Kampala.

locations.title: Uganda National Museum
locations.description: The oldest museum in East Africa, showcasing Uganda's cultural heritage through traditional artifacts, archaeology, and history exhibits.

locations.title: Nakasero Market
locations.description: Vibrant local market offering fresh produce, spices, and crafts. Experience the authentic shopping culture of Kampala.

locations.title: Ndere Cultural Centre
locations.description: Showcasing traditional Ugandan dance and music performances in a beautiful outdoor amphitheater setting.

locations.title: Uganda Wildlife Education Centre
locations.description: Conservation center featuring native wildlife and educational programs about Uganda's diverse ecosystems.

locations.title: Kasubi Tombs
locations.description: UNESCO World Heritage site and burial ground of Buganda kings, showcasing traditional architecture and cultural significance.

locations.title: Owino Market
locations.description: One of East Africa's largest markets, offering everything from textiles to electronics in a bustling atmosphere.

locations.title: Gaddafi National Mosque
locations.description: Uganda's largest mosque, offering panoramic views of Kampala from its minaret and beautiful Islamic architecture.
